Key Match Events: Miguel Terceros scored the winning goal against Colombia
Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia sits in one of South America's 2026 World Cup qualification spots ahead of facing Lionel Messi and Argentina in Buenos Aires this week
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's 1-0 win over Colombia has put them on the same number of wins as Brazil, Uruguay, Ecuador, and Colombia in the World Cup qualifying league
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia's home stadium, Estadio Municipal de El Alto, is located at an elevation of over 13,000 feet above sea level, giving them a geographical advantage in World Cup qualifying
Others: Bolivia's team has a perfect record of three wins out of three since moving their home games to El Alto, with 19 of the 28 players called up to the Bolivia squad playing their club football in Bolivia
